nav.div: Knob Noster Public Schools » News » What's New » Coronavirus Information for Parents and Students

br.br:
We want to continue to provide our families with the latest information about the Coronavirus. This page has been set up to provide an archive of communications from Knob Noster Public Schools regarding the Coronavirus. Updates will be posted as the situation dictates.
Virtual Learning District Hotlines
Food Services - Mrs. Trish Kolat - tkolat@knr8.net
Please direct all questions, requests, changes in plans, delivery of food, etc. to this address.
Technology - Mrs. Amy Wellman - awellman@knr8.net
Please direct all questions, requests, repairs, and device return inquiries to this address.
Education - Individual Teachers - Building Principals
Please direct questions specific to your child's education to the appropriate teacher. Likewise, questions that relate to a specific building may be directed to the building principal.
General Troubleshooting or Questions - Mrs. Charity Hatcher - chatcher@knr8.net
Please direct all other troubleshooting questions and issues to this address.
Frequently Asked Questions:
Click the link below to view answers to questions and statements submitted via the KNPS Parent Covid-19 Planning Survey.

Facebook Live Virtual Town Hall April 10
Facebook Live Virtual Town Hall - March 26
